notes.text: KOG with mind scan glad beasts for the 3rd straight month. Was mostly just fueling for fun then got lucky and ranked up very fast. You all a know how glads work. The only thing I did differently was remove dimacari. Found myself wanting an 1800 laquari more often than a double attack dimacari. Went smooth for the most part, had one great duel vs weevil where I had to econ take his Amazoness, tributing my floodgated golem, which opened up my field enough to get out nerok, allowing me to destroy his burning land with 500 lp left on my side. He had no resources left and I was able to win after that move.
